entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
